About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs and newspapers.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records.

About.Acquisition focus: David Jones Archives is the repository for the records of the company and of the Jones family who were associated with the company from its inception until 1980.(99% in-house).

Contact.Street address: Dock 9, Cnr Stubbs & Carnarvon Streets, Silverwater
